articles.title: Most popular Halloween costumes of 2022, according to Google Trends - USA TODAY
articles.description: From Spider-Man to "Stranger Things," Google Trend's FrightGeist lets everyone know if your costume is a popular pick this year.
articles.content:
Halloween is almost here, and if you're still trying to figure out your costume, Google may be able to help.
Whether it is a creative DIY, pop-culture inspired, couple, group or sexy-styled costume,… [+3217 chars]
